author: asrabkin
msg: CHUKWA-527  Configuration spellcheck. Contributed by Ari Rabkin.

author: sdeboy
msg: - Removing Nimbus from available look and feels (chronic issues with Nimbus look and feel and JTable colors)
- Updating displayed look and feel in preferences panel to ensure default look and feel is selected
- non-wrap option was still using multi-line jtextpane in the tablecellrenderer, causing visual glitches in Windows look and feel
- updated default msg field to be wider, other fields to right of msg field are now a bit narrower

author: davsclaus
msg: CAMEL-3216: Fixed scheduled poll to not let thread die, to ensure the scheduler keeps running.

author: kaosko
msg: RESOLVED - issue SHIRO-191: Change all StringBuffer usages to StringBuilder
- Fixed the only remaining use of StringBuffer (Javadoc stated the fix is for 2.x and comments talk about JDK 1.3 compatibility which is likely not relevant anymore)

author: wrowe
msg: prefork MPM: Run cleanups for final request when process exits gracefully,
in spite of faulty apr_reslist code.
